title: Human + Kind 1oz Body Souffle Lotion Cucumber & Melon– Lot of 10 – Each 1 Oz – Total 10 Oz
description: Human + Kind 1oz Body Souffle – Lot of 10 – Each 1 Oz – Total 10 Oz

Lightly whipped and formulated for a soft, fluffy texture, the Human+Kind two-in-one Body Soufflé is dessert for the skin. Apricot kernel oil and shea butter retain the skin’s hydration, to leave the body feeling supple and moisturized. Human+Kind personal care products are vegan, paraben-free, ethically sourced, and all natural
